name: Pseudodragon
description: A small, dragon-like creature the size of a cat, with leathery wings, a barbed tail, and shimmering scales in red, gold, or green.
memorable: Despite its small size, it showcases impressive abilities like magic resistance and telepathy.
goals: Serves as a companion, often sought after by wizards or other spellcasters.
relations: Often accompanies spellcasters or may serve as a familiar.
environment: Typically found in magical or forested areas.
strengths: Agility and stealth, with heightened senses and a strong telepathic communication ability.
weaknesses: Relatively fragile with low hit points and susceptible to direct attacks.
attacks: Can deliver a sting that inflicts piercing damage and may poison the target, potentially causing unconsciousness.
most_powerful_ability: Telepathic Static, stunning enemies with a mental assault.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 10 feet, enhancing its perceptive capabilities in its immediate surroundings.
skills: Skilled at stealth, allows it to evade detection effectively.
additional_information: Can communicate simple ideas telepathically within 100 feet.
Heightened Senses provide a Perception score of 18.
Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
Natural curiosity and playfulness; fiercely protective of companions.
Can puff smoke to obscure vision once per day.
test_queries: tiny dragon with telepathy and magic resistance
agile creature with a barbed tail
